common.logic

Interface ExitCondition

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultExitCondition

    public interface ExitCondition
    An interface that is implemented by classes that control when the loop unit exits.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Task getTask() 
      void init()
      Called when the loop is initialised (before any iterations are run)
      boolean isExitLoop(java.lang.Object[] data)
      Calculates whether the loop should exit.
      void iteration()
      Called when an iteration is run
      void setTask(Task task)
      Sets an interface to the loop task

      • isExitLoop

        boolean isExitLoop(java.lang.Object[] data)
                   throws InvalidEquationException
        Calculates whether the loop should exit. This decision can be based on a any factors, including the input data and task parameters.
        Returns:
        true if the loop should exit
        Throws:
        InvalidEquationException
